brand_identity.approach: Professional dental standards meets creative visual storytelling
brand_identity.unique_value: Combining dental expertise with motion graphics skills

current_role.title: Freelance Dental Motion Graphics Designer
achievements: Created educational and promotional dental animations for clinics in Egypt and Europe (Sweden)
Expanded client base to South America (Brazil)
Specialized in orthodontic case documentation and surgical animation
Adapted visual style to meet professional dental standards

additional_experience.title: Active Member — DSSA Egypt

contributions: Participated in team projects involving scientific content creation
Event organization and member communication coordination

technical_skills.description: Balancing freelance work with dental studies
